titleStmt.title: Three propositions or speeches, which that excellent man M. Iohn Caluin, one of the pastors of the Church of God in Geneua had there To which also is added, an exposition vpon that parte of the catechisme, which is appointed for the three and fortieth Sunday in number. Translated into Englishe, by T.VV.
titleStmt.author: Calvin, Jean, 1509-1564.
T. W. (Thomas Wilcox), 1549?-1608.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
